basic.description: Intensive development of language skills (reading, writing, speaking, listening) in the course of a general introduction to the cultural history of the German-speaking countries in the twentieth and twenty-first centuries.
basic.subject: GRMN
basic.title: Survey of German Cultural History II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in GRMN 202, or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
